headline.print_headline: Mobile Services and Cable TV Are Unexpected Allies
headline.seo: Verizon Airwave Purchase Unites Wireless and Cable
headline.main: Mobile Services and Cable TV Are Unexpected Allies

docs.snippet: A little-noticed result of Verizon’s $3.9 billion airwave purchase is that cable companies can now use the carrier’s retail presence to sell cable packaged with phone and wireless service....
docs.abstract: Little-noticed result of Verizon’s $3.9 billion airwave purchase from several firms is that cable companies can now use the carrier’s retail presence to sell cable packaged with phone and wireless service; partnership signals a major shift for both industries as until recently, wireless and cable companies were archrivals.
docs.lead_paragraph: A little-noticed result of Verizon’s $3.9 billion airwave purchase is that cable companies can now use the carrier’s retail presence to sell cable packaged with phone and wireless service.

headline.print_headline: Gen. Pavel Grachev, 64; Fought Chechen Rebels
headline.main: Gen. Pavel Grachev, Fought Chechen Rebels, Dies at 64

docs.snippet: General Grachev, a former Russian defense minister, is perhaps best remembered for promising in 1994 to crush the rebels “in a couple of hours with a single regiment of paratroopers.”...
docs.abstract: Gen Pavel Grachev, former Russian defense minister, dies at age 64.
docs.lead_paragraph: General Grachev, a former Russian defense minister, is perhaps best remembered for promising in 1994 to crush the rebels “in a couple of hours with a single regiment of paratroopers.”

headline.print_headline: For Vice President, a Heartbeat Away From the Public Isn’t Close Enough
headline.seo: On the Trail, Biden Gets Closer Than Most to Voters
headline.main: For Vice President, a Heartbeat Away From the Public Isn’t Close Enough

docs.snippet: Politicians have always pressed the flesh, but few relish doing so as heartily as Vice President Joseph R. Biden Jr....
docs.abstract: Politicians have always pressed the flesh, but few relish doing so as heartily as Vice President Joseph R Biden Jr; Biden's affectionate style with voters on the campaign trail, however, also has the potential to get him into trouble, adding to a decades-old reputation that he is gaffe-prone and undisciplined.
docs.lead_paragraph: Politicians have always pressed the flesh, but few relish doing so as heartily as Vice President Joseph R. Biden Jr.

headline.print_headline: Kerik Is Leaving His Cell to Testify at a Bronx Trial
headline.seo: Kerik to Testify at DiTommaso Perjury Trial in Bronx
headline.main: Kerik Is Leaving His Cell to Testify at a Bronx Trial

docs.snippet: Bernard B. Kerik, the former New York police commissioner imprisoned on federal charges of tax fraud and other crimes, is set to take the stand in a perjury case....
docs.abstract: Former New York City Police Commissioner Bernard B Kerik, imprisoned on federal charges of tax fraud and other crimes, is set to take the stand in the perjury trial of two of his former friends, Frank and Peter DiTommaso; case against the brothers dates to a 2006 grand jury investigation of Kerik.
docs.lead_paragraph: Bernard B. Kerik, the former New York police commissioner imprisoned on federal charges of tax fraud and other crimes, is set to take the stand in a perjury case.

headline.print_headline: To Complete a Sweep, the Mets Overcome the Sun, the Wind and the Marlins
headline.seo: Mets Brush Off the Elements as They Sweep the Marlins
headline.main: To Complete a Sweep, the Mets Overcome the Sun, the Wind and the Marlins

docs.snippet: After intentional walks in the seventh and ninth innings to get to Ruben Tejada, he singled in the ninth to score Scott Hairston and lift the Mets to a victory....
docs.abstract: New York Mets defeat Miami Marlins, 3-2, to complete a three-game sweep.
docs.lead_paragraph: After intentional walks in the seventh and ninth innings to get to Ruben Tejada, he singled in the ninth to score Scott Hairston and lift the Mets to a victory.

docs.snippet: Designs for a new building by the architecture firm Sanaa, to be used as a spiritual and community center, are to be submitted for approval on Monday by Grace Farms Foundation in New Canaan, Conn....
docs.abstract: Architecture firm Sanaa will submit plans for a new spiritual and community center for Grace Farms Foundation in New Canaan, Conn.
docs.lead_paragraph: Designs for a new building by the architecture firm Sanaa, to be used as a spiritual and community center, are to be submitted for approval on Monday by Grace Farms Foundation in New Canaan, Conn.

headline.seo: Television Changes, but the Fall Season Endures

docs.snippet: The idea of a fall season of TV premieres, originally tied to the model year for cars, has survived changing viewer habits and the constant flow of new cable programs....
docs.abstract: Fall season of television premieres, originally tied to model year for cars, has survived changing viewer habits and constant flow of new cable programs; attention to the new network shows, in defiance of diminishing ratings, seems only to have increased; advertisers have committed $9 billion, unchanged from 2011 season.
docs.lead_paragraph: The idea of a fall season of TV premieres, originally tied to the model year for cars, has survived changing viewer habits and the constant flow of new cable programs.

docs.snippet: Thecreators of the series announced that HBO had ordered a fourth and final season one day before the Season 3 premiere, The Times-Picayune of New Orleans reported....
docs.abstract: HBO television drama Treme is renewed for a fourth and final season, and will return with a full cast.
docs.lead_paragraph: Thecreators of the series announced that HBO had ordered a fourth and final season one day before the Season 3 premiere, The Times-Picayune of New Orleans reported.

headline.print_headline: Belarus Votes as Europe Keeps a Watch for Signs That Sanctions Can End
headline.seo: Belarus Holds Election With European Sanctions at Stake
headline.main: Belarus Votes as Europe Keeps a Watch for Signs That Sanctions Can End

docs.snippet: The question was not whether President Aleksandr G. Lukashenko’s supporters would continue to dominate Parliament, but whether electoral changes would pass muster with the European Union....
docs.abstract: Belarus holds parliamentary elections and international observers note improvements in the country's election law; European Union, having shifted their emphasis to election law and away from political prisoners, will review the travel ban imposed on President Aleksandr G Lukashenko in 2010.
docs.lead_paragraph: The question was not whether President Aleksandr G. Lukashenko’s supporters would continue to dominate Parliament, but whether electoral changes would pass muster with the European Union.

docs.snippet: At the Buffett Cup in Omaha this month probably the best defense occurred in the diagramed deal....
docs.abstract: Phillip Alder Bridge column on deal played at the Buffett Cup in Omaha.
docs.lead_paragraph: At the Buffett Cup in Omaha this month probably the best defense occurred in the diagramed deal.
